CustomField.description:
Field establishing the junction object relationship with Wear Test
Enter any text into the Wear Test Participant Name field. A workflow will update the name to Participant Name-Wear Test
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Link to the Wear Test
Enter any text into the Wear Test Participant Name field. A workflow will update the name to Participant Name-Wear Test
CustomField.label: Wear Test
